text:
*HubSpot WORKFLOW*
Two questions :
- Is it possible to trigger based on an email response ? 
- Is it possible to add an action that trigger a call ? (with a webhook?)

Thanks everyone
We've triggered on an email response by using zapier and gmail, you can trigger a call with callrail and zapier (i believe)
Is there anyway to change a HubSpot CTA's color w/ inline styling in a custom template? Or is whatever is specified in the CTA section what it will always default to
I usually just end up selecting the Link (no style) option and style the whole thing myself
Each cta has a custom case feature which is essentially the same as inline styling.
Not highly recommended. But it does work.

Hi All. I know there have been some suggestions to create a feedback channel for the new Design Manager, so we've done just that. Head over to <#C960Q64G4|design-manager> if you are interested in joining.

Question - I have a custom module which utilizes a negative margin on part of it and that appears to be causing the HubSpot page editor to not be able to figure out the height of the module. so when you hover over it the page editors hover  region ends up covering all of the modules below it. Anyone know any tricks to fix this? ( and don’t say don’t use negative margin - because that appears to be the best solution to creating this design)

<@U24DCSJBE> <@U22PU4G4A> I have an issue in two portals where the form is submitting but is not redirecting to the confirmation page. I believe I just figured out if I remove the checkbox field from the form, the form works fine. Is this a possible bug with single checkbox fields? Can you help me look into this? I also submitted a ticket earlier in portal 3470270.
<@U7SL518D6> Can you link to to the page?

<http://www.plasticcomponents.com/home>

These are the modules having the issue

<https://spin.d.pr/F0yQH7>

Apologies ahead of time may respond slow
away from computer for a little bit
No Problem. Where exactly are you using the negative margin?
